text:
This has rather surprising behaviour when using `add_contours` with `filled=True`. Example of one suprising behaviour can be seen from a plot in PR #1315. 

It appears that we need an argument called `threshold=1e-6` in `add_contours` for the same terminology in consistent with `add_overlay` to suppress out minimum background value given in `threshold`.
title: Inconsitency of having and not having argument `threshold` in add_overlay and add_contours
Inconsitency of having and not having argument `threshold` in add_overlay and add_contours

text:
I am +1 on changing threshold in add_contours from None to 1e-6, as in
add_overlay.
